I_REG_DTM ,'CTI' AS I_LST_CORC_ID ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS I_LST_CORC_DTM ,#i_req_ncnt# AS I_REQ_NCNT ,#i_sec10_in_cnnt_ncnt# AS I_SEC10_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,#i_sec20_in_cnnt_ncnt# AS I_SEC20_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,#i_sec30_in_cnnt_ncnt# AS I_SEC30_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,#i_sec40_in_cnnt_ncnt# AS I_SEC40_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,#i_sec50_in_cnnt_ncnt# AS I_SEC50_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,#i_sec60_in_cnnt_ncnt# AS ,T1.CONSULT_CUR_DRTM = T2.I_CONSULT_CUR_DRTM ,T1.SUSP_DRTM = T2.I_SUSP_DRTM ,T1.EXT_CUR_DRTM = T2.I_EXT_CUR_DRTM ,T1.UNKN_CUR_DRTM = T2.I_UNKN_CUR_DRTM ,T1.INBND_HOUSE = T2.I_INBND_HOUSE T2.I_LST_CORC_ID ,T1.LST_CORC_DTM = T2.I_LST_CORC_DTM ,T1.REQ_NCNT = T2.I_REQ_NCNT ,T1.SEC10_IN_CNNT_NCNT = T2.I_SEC10_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T1.SEC20_IN_CNNT_NCNT = T2.I_SEC20_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T1.SEC30_IN_CNNT_NCNT = T2.I_SEC30_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T1.SEC40_IN_CNNT_NCNT = T2.I_SEC40_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T1.SEC50_IN_CNNT_NCNT = T2.I_SEC50_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T1.SEC60_IN_CNNT_NCNT = T2.I_SEC60_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T1.DIALING_DRTM ,T1.OTBND_DRTM ,T1.OTBND_HOUSE ,T1.DIALING_NCNT ) VALUES ( T2.I_TIME_KEY ,T2.I_USR_ID ,T2.I_INBND_DRTM ,T2.I_TEL_RING_DRTM ,T2.I_CONSULT_CUR_DRTM ,T2.I_SUSP_DRTM ,T2.I_EXT_CUR_DRTM ,T2.I_UNKN_CUR_DRTM ,T2.I_INBND_HOUSE ,T2.I_TEL_RING_NCNT ,T2.I_CONSULT_CUR_NCNT ,T2.I_SUSP_NCNT ,T2.I_EXT_CUR_NCNT ,T2.I_UNKN_CALL_NCNT ,T2.I_HOUSE_SWT_RCV_NCNT ,T2.I_HOUSE_SWT_TRY_NCNT ,T2.I_METI_CUR_NCNT ,T2.I_FWD_CALLCNT ,T2.I_REG_ID ,T2.I_REG_DTM ,T2.I_LST_CORC_ID ,T2.I_LST_CORC_DTM ,T2.I_REQ_NCNT ,T2.I_SEC10_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T2.I_SEC20_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T2.I_SEC30_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T2.I_SEC40_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T2.I_SEC50_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T2.I_SEC60_IN_CNNT_NCNT ,T2.I_INBND_DRTM ,T2.I_INBND_HOUSE
